Using a voice recorder: A voice recorder can be used to record spoken words, which can then be transcribed into text using speech recognition software.
Using a typewriter: A typewriter can be used to write down text, although it is a more traditional and less common method of writing.
Using a laser pointer: A laser pointer can be used to project text onto a surface, such as a whiteboard or a piece of paper.
Using a camera: A camera can be used to take a picture of written text, which can then be saved and edited on a computer.
Using a smartwatch: A smartwatch with a touchscreen can be used to write down text using a virtual keyboard.
